languages.text: {n}Друкари растягивает рот в ехидной улыбке.{/n} "Разумеется. Насколько мне известно, ты сам{mf||а} повстречал{mf|ся|ась} с моим посланцем, проникшим к тебе на судно — кабалитом, который оставил в одном из мон-кай личинку, полученную от Тервантьяса. Или ты так и не выяснил{mf||а}, в чем причина предательства при давнишнем абордаже? Ммм. Тогда о спящих агентах, скрытых на твоих мирах, и говорить нечего".

{n}Marazhai's mouth widens into a wicked smile.{/n} "Of course. If I am not mistaken, you met the infiltrator yourself — a Kabalite who left a larva from Tervantias in one of the mon-keigh. Or did you never work out the reason for the treachery during the raid on your ship so long ago now? Hmm. Then there is no need for me to mention the sleeper agents hidden on your worlds."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари растягивает рот в ехидной улыбке.{/n} "Разумеется. languages.text: {n}Marazhai sonríe con maldad.{/n} «Si no me equivoco, ya conociste al infiltrado: un Kabalista que dejó una de las larvas de Tervantias dentro de uno de los mon-keigh. ¿O acaso no habías descubierto la causa de la traición durante la incursión contra tu nave hace ya tanto tiempo? Mmm... En ese caso, mejor no digo nada sobre los agentes durmientes que tenemos ocultos en tus mundos».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth widens into a wicked smile.{/n} "Of course. If I am not mistaken, you met the infiltrator yourself — a Kabalite who left a larva from Tervantias in one of the mon-keigh. Or did you never work out the reason for the treachery during the raid on your ship so long ago now? Hmm. Then there is no need for me to mention the sleeper agents hidden on your worlds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sonríe con maldad.{/n} «Si no me equivoco, ya conociste al infiltrado: un Kabalista que dejó una de las larvas de Tervantias dentro de uno de los mon-keigh. ¿O acaso no habías descubierto la causa de la traición durante la incursión contra tu nave hace ya tanto tiempo? Mmm... En ese caso, mejor no digo nada sobre los agentes durmientes que tenemos ocultos en tus mundos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋咧开了嘴，露出了邪恶的笑容。{/n}“当然，如果我没记错的话，你亲眼见过那个渗透者。那是阴谋团的成员，将特万提亚斯的寄生虫留在了其中一个猴子身上。还是说，你的飞船很久之前遭到袭击时，你根本没弄清楚叛乱究竟是怎么发生的？嗯，既然如此，我就没必要提及那些依然潜伏在你的行星上的特工了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth widens into a wicked smile.{/n} "Of course. If I am not mistaken, you met the infiltrator yourself — a Kabalite who left a larva from Tervantias in one of the mon-keigh. Or did you never work out the reason for the treachery during the raid on your ship so long ago now? Hmm. Then there is no need for me to mention the sleeper agents hidden on your worlds."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋咧开了嘴，露出了邪恶的笑容。{/n}“当然，如果我没记错的话，你亲眼见过那个渗透者。那是阴谋团的成员，将特万提亚斯的寄生虫留在了其中一个猴子身上。还是说，你的飞船很久之前遭到袭击时，你根本没弄清楚叛乱究竟是怎么发生的？嗯，既然如此，我就没必要提及那些依然潜伏在你的行星上的特工了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの口が横に広がり、邪悪な笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「もちろんだ。俺の記憶が間違っていなければ、お前自身が浸透者と会っただろう。テルヴァンティアスの幼虫をモン＝ケイに潜ませたカバライトだ。それとも、遥か昔に起きた船への襲撃の際の、裏切りの理由を今もまだ知らないないのか？ううむ。そうだとしたら、お前たちの惑星に隠れている潜伏スパイについて俺が話す必要はなさそうだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth widens into a wicked smile.{/n} "Of course. If I am not mistaken, you met the infiltrator yourself — a Kabalite who left a larva from Tervantias in one of the mon-keigh. Or did you never work out the reason for the treachery during the raid on your ship so long ago now? Hmm. Then there is no need for me to mention the sleeper agents hidden on your worlds."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの口が横に広がり、邪悪な笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「もちろんだ。俺の記憶が間違っていなければ、お前自身が浸透者と会っただろう。テルヴァンティアスの幼虫をモン＝ケイに潜ませたカバライトだ。それとも、遥か昔に起きた船への襲撃の際の、裏切りの理由を今もまだ知らないないのか？ううむ。そうだとしたら、お前たちの惑星に隠れている潜伏スパイについて俺が話す必要はなさそうだな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire malicieux.{/n} « Bien entendu. Sauf erreur de ma part, vous avez rencontré mon agent infiltré en chair et en os, un Kabalite qui a implanté une larve de Tervantias dans l'un des mon-keigh. Ne me dites pas que vous n'avez toujours pas compris qui vous avait {mf|trahi|trahie} lorsque votre vaisseau a été attaqué il y a si longtemps ? Hmm... Si tel est le cas, il est inutile que je vous parle des agents dormants infiltrés dans vos mondes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth widens into a wicked smile.{/n} "Of course. If I am not mistaken, you met the infiltrator yourself — a Kabalite who left a larva from Tervantias in one of the mon-keigh. Or did you never work out the reason for the treachery during the raid on your ship so long ago now? Hmm. Then there is no need for me to mention the sleeper agents hidden on your worlds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire malicieux.{/n} « Bien entendu. Sauf erreur de ma part, vous avez rencontré mon agent infiltré en chair et en os, un Kabalite qui a implanté une larve de Tervantias dans l'un des mon-keigh. Ne me dites pas que vous n'avez toujours pas compris qui vous avait {mf|trahi|trahie} lorsque votre vaisseau a été attaqué il y a si longtemps ? Hmm... Si tel est le cas, il est inutile que je vous parle des agents dormants infiltrés dans vos mondes. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Mund verzieht sich zu einem bösen Grinsen.{/n} "Natürlich. Wenn mich nicht alles täuscht, seid Ihr dem Infiltrator selbst begegnet — einem Mitglied der Kabale, das eine Larve von Tervantias in einem der Chem-Pan-Sey hinterlassen hat. Oder habt Ihr den Grund für den Verrat während des Überfalls auf Euer Schiff vor so langer Zeit etwa nie ergründet? Hmm. Dann muss ich die Schläferagenten, die auf Euren Welten versteckt sind, wohl nicht erwähnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth widens into a wicked smile.{/n} "Of course. If I am not mistaken, you met the infiltrator yourself — a Kabalite who left a larva from Tervantias in one of the mon-keigh. Or did you never work out the reason for the treachery during the raid on your ship so long ago now? Hmm. Then there is no need for me to mention the sleeper agents hidden on your worlds."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın ağzı, hınzır bir gülümsemeyle yayılıyor.{/n} "Tabii ki. Yanılmıyorsam sızanlardan biriyle, mon-keighlerden birine Tervantias'ın larvasını bırakan Kabalistle de bizzat tanıştın. Yoksa gemine yapılan baskın sırasındaki ihanetin sebebini hâlâ anlayamamış mıydın? Hımm. O zaman dünyalarında gizlenen casuslardan hiç söz etmeyeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mouth widens into a wicked smile.{/n} "Of course. If I am not mistaken, you met the infiltrator yourself — a Kabalite who left a larva from Tervantias in one of the mon-keigh. Or did you never work out the reason for the treachery during the raid on your ship so long ago now? Hmm. Then there is no need for me to mention the sleeper agents hidden on your worlds."

Yanılmıyorsam sızanlardan biriyle, mon-keighlerden birine Tervantias'ın larvasını bırakan Kabalistle de bizzat tanıştın. Yoksa gemine yapılan baskın sırasındaki ihanetin sebebini hâlâ anlayamamış mıydın? Hımm. O zaman dünyalarında gizlenen casuslardan hiç söz etmeyeyim."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
